title: Amid demand slowdown, EVs plug into PE recharging infrastructure
description: Private equity firms are increasing investments in India's electric two- and three-wheeler industry amidst a slowdown in electric passenger vehicle sales. Total funding in the first half of 2024 reached $754 million. Electric two-wheeler sales are on the rise, but electric passenger vehicle sales have declined. Challenges such as range anxiety and inadequate charging infrastructure persist.
